entry.title: Creating Custom Plugins for Pelican
entry.content:
Tags: plugins, pelican, python

Plugins extend the functionality of Pelican. Whether you want to add new features or modify existing ones, creating custom plugins is a powerful way to enhance your Pelican site. In this article, we'll walk you through the basics of developing a Pelican plugin.

entry.title: Introduction to Pelican
entry.content:
Tags: pelican, static site generator, python

Pelican is a static site generator that allows you to create fast and flexible websites using Markdown or reStructuredText. In this article, we'll explore the basics of setting up Pelican and creating your first static website.

entry.title: Using Themes in Pelican
entry.content:
Tags: themes, pelican, customization

One of the great features of Pelican is its support for themes. You can easily change the look and feel of your site by applying different themes. This article will guide you through the process of installing and customizing themes in Pelican.
